title: Issue in analyze_videos
body:
USING: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut2.0
Ipython in docker container

**The issue:**
=> Videos are not being analyzed!
It seems **./my_video-5DeepCut_resnet50_testeFeb2shuffle1_600000.h5 does not exist !!**
# #########################################################
```
**In [14]:** deeplabcut.analyze_videos(path_config,['/home/rodrigo/teste-rodrigo-2019-02-02/videos/'],videotype='.mkv')

Using snapshot-600000 for model /home/rodrigo/teste-rodrigo-2019-02-02/dlc-models/iteration-0/testeFeb2-trainset95shuffle1
INFO:tensorflow:Restoring parameters from /home/rodrigo/teste-rodrigo-2019-02-02/dlc-models/iteration-0/testeFeb2-trainset95shuffle1/train/snapshot-600000
INFO:tensorflow:Restoring parameters from /home/rodrigo/teste-rodrigo-2019-02-02/dlc-models/iteration-0/testeFeb2-trainset95shuffle1/train/snapshot-600000
Analyzing all the videos in the directory
Starting to analyze %  my_video-5.mkv
Loading  my_video-5.mkv
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
FileNotFoundError                         Traceback (most recent call last)
/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/predict_videos.py in AnalyzeVideo(video, DLCscorer, trainFraction, cfg, dlc_cfg, sess, inputs, outputs, pdindex, save_as_csv, destfolder)
    262         # Attempt to load data...
--> 263         pd.read_hdf(dataname)
    264         print("Video already analyzed!", dataname)

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pandas/io/pytables.py in read_hdf(path_or_buf, key, mode, **kwargs)
    346             raise compat.FileNotFoundError(
--> 347                 'File %s does not exist' % path_or_buf)
    348 

**_FileNotFoundError: File ./my_video-5DeepCut_resnet50_testeFeb2shuffle1_600000.h5 does not exist_**

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

ZeroDivisionError                         Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-14-86c19342e065> in <module>()
----> 1 deeplabcut.analyze_videos(path_config,['/home/rodrigo/teste-rodrigo-2019-02-02/videos/'],videotype='.mkv')

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/predict_videos.py in analyze_videos(config, videos, videotype, shuffle, trainingsetindex, gputouse, save_as_csv, destfolder)
    151         #looping over videos
    152         for video in Videos:
--> 153             AnalyzeVideo(video,DLCscorer,trainFraction,cfg,dlc_cfg,sess,inputs, outputs,pdindex,save_as_csv, destfolder)
    154 
    155     os.chdir(str(start_path))

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/predict_videos.py in AnalyzeVideo(video, DLCscorer, trainFraction, cfg, dlc_cfg, sess, inputs, outputs, pdindex, save_as_csv, destfolder)
    269         fps = cap.get(5) #https://docs.opencv.org/2.4/modules/highgui/doc/reading_and_writing_images_and_video.html#videocapture-get
    270         nframes = int(cap.get(7))
--> 271         duration=nframes*1./fps
    272         size=(int(cap.get(4)),int(cap.get(3)))
    273 

**ZeroDivisionError: float division by zero**
```
